summary: Borriston Laboratories, Inc. is a manufacturer of Hepatic Microsomal Enzymes. The company is based in Maryland but has offices in North Carolina and Missouri. It is selling the product for $5,400.00 per kilogram. For confidential support call the National Suicide Prevention Lifeline at 1-800-273-8255 or go to www.suicidepreventionlifeline.org.
